title: Heidrick & Struggles Acquires BTG in Future of Work Deal
itunes:title: Heidrick & Struggles Acquires BTG in Future of Work Deal
description:
Heidrick & Struggles CEO Krishnan Rajagopalan and Business Talent Group CEO Jody Greenstone Miller discuss combining forces in the evolving world of the future of work.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
